text: haey you so hv ban pol towkean anak del keat ban doeng tha ke pitchea nung ruochphot pi tosa mneak knongchamnaom ke teangpir tha chaur anak chuoy romluk khnhom aoy lokamcheasa robsa anak ban doengophng( daembi yokchenh pi montir khoumkheang) bo nde shai t n ban thveu aoy ke phe l ch peakyabandam nih tow aoy lokamcheasa robsa ke dau che neah ke( you so hv) kaban sthetnow knong montir khoumkheang noh asa rypel bonman chhnam ttowtiet
